section.title: Leap.Unity.Interaction.SlidingWindowThrow Class Reference

para.para: The sliding window throw handler implements a simple heuristic that provides a reasonably accurate measure of the user's intended "throw direction" for a physical object. It is used as the default implementation of an Interaction Behaviour's throw handler.

listitem.para: void OnHold (InteractionBehaviour intObj, ReadonlyList< InteractionController > controllers)
Samples the current velocity and adds it to a rolling average.
Transfers the averaged velocity to the released object.
